text: Juan de Dios Castillo González (31 January 1951 - 1 May 2014) was a Mexican association football player and coach. He coached Honduran club C.D. Motagua before his death. He also became the head coach of El Salvador national football team in July 2012. He was born in Mexico City. Castillo died from skin cancer on 1 May 2014 in Monterrey, Nuevo León. He was 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Juan de Dios Castillo Liga MX stats at Medio Tiempo Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexican football managers Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Deaths from skin cancer
title: Juan de Dios Castillo
